content: I've been looking into eco-friendly fashion brands and came across Hemp Wear, which I think is a great option. I've also been using a bamboo toothbrush with natural bristles from EcoDental, and it's been working out great. Speaking of natural products, I recently switched to a sulfate-free shampoo from Green Earth, which I found on Amazon, and my hair feels a lot healthier and softer. Do you know of any other natural hair care brands that I might like?
